agentAbility.name: Hunter's Mark
agentAbility.description: Identify weaknesses in opponents. After activation, looking at any tank will reveal the location of its critical modules to both Hound and his team. Aiming at any revealed critical zone and penetrating the tank is enough to hit it while Hunter's Mark is on the opponent. Critical damage on a Marked tank will extend the effect's duration.

primaryAttack.name: ATGM Launcher
primaryAttack.description: Missile launcher with manual guidance to target.

tankAbilities.name: Feign Destruction
tankAbilities.description: Using advanced pyro equipment, the vehicle feigns its own destruction to look like a wrecked tank. While in this effect, it is Obscured. If it takes any offensive action, the effect ends. While the vehicle is obstructed, Active Protection System protects it from any shell fired by a main gun.

tankAbilities.name: Vanish
tankAbilities.description: The vehicle's electronic warfare system come into effect and block the vision of any opponent looking at the tank through optics, allowing Fantome to ambush or escape.
